text.headline:
The love story of
Dada and Hugo‚ù§Ô∏è
The Beginning
text.text:
Meeting you is the best thing that has happened in my life, it felt like the stars had aligned to bring us together, and every moment we've shared has been nothing short of surreal.
I still remember how nervous I was when I confessed to you in Korean. It wasn‚Äôt the fear of rejection that made me nervous, but the worry that my words and pronunciation wouldn‚Äôt make a perfect confession.

text.headline: First Kissüòò
text.text: A month into our relationship, I was certain I had chosen the right person. That‚Äôs when I decided to surprise you.

text.headline: 50 Days
text.text: Unfortunately, you went back to Korea during the holidays, marking our first long distance relationship. This is when I first felt empty without you by my side.

text.headline: Science Centre
text.text: This is the first time my bae has planned a trip, and it truly sets you apart from others. I deeply appreciate how you invest equal effort into our relationship and cherish the affection I have for you, never taking it for granted.

text.headline: 100 Days
text.text: This marks the first milestone of our relationship, and for the first time in my life, I‚Äôve decided to buy flowers for a girl. I may not be the most romantic person, but I always want to keep my bae pleasantly surprised.

text.headline: Happy Brithday To Youüêª
text.text:
This was the most challenging surprise I‚Äôve ever planned for you. First it was a rainful day, then the picnic mat was too small, and to top it off, the cake I brought for you melted.üò≠ Despite all that, you were still thankful for the effort I made.
To make sure you feel my presence even when I‚Äôm away, I got you this giant Hugo Bear as a stand-in for my hugs.

text.headline: My Graduationüéì
text.text: The inevitable has come. You were deeply saddened by my graduation, as it meant we could no longer share our daily journeys to and from school. To console you and preserve our memories, we captured lots of photos together in our uniforms.

text.headline: Happy Birthday To Me
text.text: This has been the best birthday in my 20 years. The gift you made me was incredibly touching, and the more I reflect on it, the luckier I feel to have met you. That‚Äôs why I promised never to leave you; you‚Äôve brought me a happiness I‚Äôve never known before.‚ù§Ô∏è

text.headline: Pulau Ubin
text.text:
We had always wanted to travel together, but your parents wouldn't permit us. As an alternative, we ventured to Pulau Ubin for a picnic.
Thankfully, after one and half year, our dream had came true!

text.headline: Merry Chrismas
text.text: We had planned to decorate my room and take photos in pajamas, but unfortunately, my parents disrupted those plans. Even though we managed to have a good time at RuiXin‚Äôs house, I couldn‚Äôt help feeling disappointed and apologetic for not being able to follow through with our original plan.

text.headline: Valentine's Day
text.text: This was our first Valentine‚Äôs Day together, and it also fell on the eve of my departure for National Service. Although you had Hugo Bear for company, I anticipated the depth of your sadness during my absence. To bridge the distance, I set up automated messages to remind you of my constant presence. As it turned out, this gesture was unnecessary since I was able to stay in touch daily from camp. Nevertheless, you were moved by the thoughtfulness behind my actions.

text.headline: Long Distance Relationship
text.text: My bae has been crying almost every night we talk, and it truly breaks my heart. Yet, I understand that this is an experience we must endure and one we will surely overcome. Speaking to you every night has also provided me with a moment of relief amid the tough training, and for that, I am once again grateful to have you in my life.

text.headline: Firt Anniversary
text.text: Fortunately, this special day landed on a weekend. However, my surprise for you didn‚Äôt go as planned; not only did I have to shave bald for NS, but the suit I purchased also fell short of my expectations. Instead, you turned the tables with a surprise of your own, donning a uniform, and together we enjoyed a delightful day at the aquarium.

text.headline: Cat Cafeüê±
text.text: You discovered the place I‚Äôve always longed for. Although the cats weren‚Äôt very friendly with humans, I still enjoyed my time with them. And don‚Äôt worry bae, you are still cuter than the cats, and my affection for you will always be greater.ü•∞

text.headline: ORD
text.text: Today marks the day I leave hell.üò≠ I‚Äôm thankful that you skipped school to attend my Passing Out Parade, and I believe I was the only one fortunate enough to receive flowers.üòÜ It was also a significant day as you officially met my parents.

text.headline: Game CafeüéÆ
text.text: We were running out of places to date, so we decided to try out gaming. It turns out my bae has some talent for games, although still not quite at level with me. This is yet another thing about my bae that I can proudly flex about.

text.headline: Happy Birthday To You Again
text.text: I know my bae relies on ice cream to survive, so this place was definitely a great surprise. And my bae turned back into an adorable kid that day.üòù

text.headline: Your Graduationüéì
text.text: To reciprocate the gift for my graduation, I bought you flowers too! And when we meet in school again, you will be my senior instead.ü•≤

text.headline: Happy Birthday To Me Again
text.text: My bae surprised me this time, but the stupid weather made my bae cry because we nearly missed the chance to go up to the Supertree.

text.headline: Prom King and Queen
text.text: The most memorable day of my life! I felt as if we were getting married that day! It was also the first time we slept together. If I had attended the prom, we would definitely have been crowned prom queen and king!

text.headline: Happy New Year
text.text: Another memorable date as we could finally watch the New Year fireworks together! It was fun going on a double date. I wish you had more freedom so that we could plan even more exciting events for our dates.

text.headline: Valentine's Day Again
text.text: I have not done much for this date, but you amazed me with the jar of 200 reasons why you love me. I adore the way you always create handmade gifts for me, while I tend to buy things‚Ä¶ but this anniversary, things are going to be different!

text.headline: Zoo Tour
text.text: The zoo might have been dull, but having my bae there made the day enjoyable. It‚Äôs funny how Koreans seem to adore pandas even more than the people of Sichuan do. It‚Äôs a pity we missed out on visiting the reservoir I‚Äôve always wanted to show you, but I promise, one day we will.

text.headline: Universal Studios Singapore
text.text: Our second anniversary has arrived! It‚Äôs hard to believe I‚Äôve been dating such an adorable and beautiful girl for two years. I hope you‚Äôre not too disappointed in Hugo for not braving the roller coaster again. ü•∫ While I might be scared of that, I‚Äôm not afraid to sacrifice my life for my bae!
